The essential oil obtained from Iranian and Spanish collections of M. longifolia was reported to have an LD 50 value of 470 mg/kg and 437.4 mg/kg in rats and mice, correspondingly.
19, 20 However, it is deserving of note that LD 50 information relating to this herb was not reported by others.
21 There is a direct relationship between the components of a plant and its toxicity and different Mentha spp. could have a toxicity range.
